Career Profile

Driven, self-taught aspiring Platform Engineer and relationship builder determined to unblock problems for companies that want to modernise and become more efficient through the use of technology. Early foundation in IT Support, bulk as a technical recruiter and most recently a Platform Engineer, I bring a self starter attitude and experience serving stakeholders in challenging environments both large and small. Over the last two years specifically, I have been working towards a career change back to hands on IT, gaining proficiency and professional certifications in Google Cloud and associated technologies for a leading Google Cloud Partner while building their technical teams.

Experiences

Lead Talent Partner

Feb 2021 - Present
Appsbroker

Appsbroker is one of the largest Google Cloud-only Agile Systems Integrators and Managed Services Providers (MSPs) in EMEA delivering digital transformation for some of the worlds leading organisations. It is Privately owned and based in Swindon. I was originally brought on to scale up Platform, Data and Application Development teams to meet a huge demand for our services as a result of digital transformational needs across the industry. From Day 1 - Ongoing learning and mentoring, resulting in a secondment position to Platform Engineering.
